ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Money troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: And hunt with Monks, they are always throwing the copper and silver on the ground! :) Money is odd, I now just started hunting in Splitpaw, where the mobs drop
ygData.messageBody:
And hunt with Monks, they are always throwing the copper and silver on the ground! :)

Money is odd, I now just started hunting in Splitpaw, where the mobs drop fine steel weapons fairly frequently. 5 plat a piece at the merchant! I was happily stunned.

For me, I think of the game like that sometimes, recognizing the feeling of accomplishment I felt at the point where the mobs starting dropping a plat here and there (mid 20s in Kunark for me) and now in my low 30's they drop 5 plat weapons.

Course, the flip side is the stuff I want now is enormously expensive. Recently I paid nearly 1k for 6 pieces of armor and that was concidured "cheap stuff".

Zorel
shadow knight, who is broke again.


--- mferrulo@... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/26/01 11:13:18 AM Eastern
> Standard Time,
> akane@... writes:
>
>
> > Hi all,
> >
> > I'm a level 9 Ranger (almost 10), and when I get
> to lvl 20, looking forward
> > to a nice wedding. I'm looking to take my time
> leveling, so I can make some
> > good money for a ring, presents, food, etc.
> Where's the best money to be
> > had?
> >
>
> At level 10 I'd say Black Burrow for cash and items
> that sell well to
> merchants (FS weapons, Snake Fangs, Venom Sacks, etc
> etc).
>
> Wizaro Wrathcaster
> 58 Wizard on Solusek Ro
>
